title: Beautifull 2 Bed House East Falls Available July 1st
description:
CALL or drop an email. Beautifully renovated 2 bedroom house for rent in the convenient East Falls area. New double glazed windows throughout. Two blocks from train and next to Manayunk. 15 minutes from Philadelphia City Centre. Hardwood floors throughout house.
Large & beautifully finished bathroom. Washer & Dryer, dishwasher, refrigerator, gas cooker. Finished basement. Gas heat. House has front porch. Water bills included. AVAILABLE JULY 1ST.  East Falls is one of the few Philadelphia communities with a direct connection to the Schuylkill River and Fairmount Park. There are a ton of things to enjoy! Lovely pocket parks complement the recreation available on the loop edging the river drives. Plus, East Falls boasts great restaurants with music and entertainment for adults; story time for children and diverse programs for adults at the local library; two parks, two recreation centers, play areas, art programs, festivals, and even a fabulous community theater pulls East Falls together throughout the year!

title: 1800ft2 - Beautiful house for rent in Somerton
description:
Be the first family to live in this enormous home post renovation. This home features a large floorplan with 3 spacious bedrooms on the upper level. The entire upper level features new carpets and paint, new fans in all bedrooms and renovated bathrooms with beautiful stone design LVP flooring. The master bath has a custom double vanity with stone top, a huge storage closet and a beautiful hand tiled walk in shower with upgraded shower head and sprayer. If you would like to view call now at: show contact info
The common bathroom has a new vinyl tub/shower and gorgeous stone top vanity. On the main level you will enjoy a large front to back great room with new paint and LVP flooring, a separate dining room with fan, a back of the house den with fan looking out over the newly built deck and fenced in back yard. the kitchen has all new stone countertops and lighting, new appliances, new flooring, new sink, you name it. The pantry is spacious. The cabinets have been freshly painted and all the hinges, doorknobs, cabinet and drawer pulls, etc throughout the home are new brushed nickel fixtures. Even the toilets are new.
In the basement you will find a two car garage with freshly refurbished doors and openers and a double sized studio ready for use as a teen suite, ballet/exercise area, game room, workshop or - use your imagination! Outside the lot is enormous and features a spacious outbuilding, a fenced in area and lots of space to live. Blocks from Pine Road Elementary School! This home is beautiful, bright and practically new and it will not last. Pets are accepted on a case-by-case basis with a nonrefundable pet fee. Available now!

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 6th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
* Move-In Special! *
If you apply today, reserve a studio apartment home, elect a 10 to 22 month lease term, and move in on or before July 1, 2022, then take $500.00 off your prorated rent. New residents only. Certain restriction apply. Limited time offer.
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 610 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Resmate, our robot concierge on our website 24/7! Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
1-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: spacious three bedroom with nice features
description: nestled on a very quiet, suburban-like block in the Somerton section of Northeast Philly. A deep rear lawn and multi-car driveway leads into a light-filled foyer entrance, a very large living room, a formal dining room and a large eat-in kitchen with tons of counter and cabinet space. Off to the side of the kitchen area is another large family room area with sliding doors to a great fenced grass yard for entertaining or playing fetch with Fido. There's also a main floor powder room and a large storage closet.  Continue up to the second level and you'll find a roomy primary bedroom with an attached sitting area that's ideal for relaxing with a book or using as an office space. The connecting  en-suite full bathroom boasts a tub/shower combo and a convenient laundry area. There are also two additional very good sized bedrooms with great closet space on this level.

title: Classic, much upgraded Philadelphia rowhouse
description:
Completely renovated and upgraded, classic south Philly row house in historic Dickinson Narrows. It has 3 upstairs bedrooms with a fully renovated bathroom (tub, shower, toilet, vanity and floor), living room and dining room, beautiful, high end kitchen with imported slate floor, hardwood cabinets, quartz counter tops, all stainless appliances: fridge, oven, microwave, brand new dishwasher, garbage disposal, excellent recessed overhead lighting. First floor laundry room with high end washer and dryer, sink, and, a fully renovated half bathroom. Completely repainted interior, with brand new carpet in living room, dining room and downstairs hallway, on the stairs, upstairs hallway and all 3 bedrooms. Small, fenced, concrete, lighted patio. Full, unfinished, storage basement (dry and watertight). Heated by a very good quality, high efficiency gas heater, but, alas, no central air. Energy efficient low E windows throughout the house, which keep the house warm in the winter, cool in the summer. Good quality blinds on all of the windows. A new, rubber roof was put on in late 2017. Cable and internet ready. Up to 2 cats allowed, with a pet fee of $50 per month for each cat. Built in 1890 (the year that my great grandparents bought it), this historic house has many of its original, classic, late Victorian features and fixtures, along with many modern upgrades. Please email me, call, or, text, at  show contact info
, to arrange your visit. As I live over 1 hour from the house, I`m showing it on Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Saturdays, from 5-8 PM.  Paul, owner of 539 Fernon St.
